markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Kitsune Spell Expertise](/Feats.aspx?ID=2629) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kitsune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=341" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 125 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Kitsune Spell Mysteries](/Feats.aspx?ID=2624)

</column>

---

Your tails show your magical mastery. During your daily preparations, choose [_confusion_](/Spells.aspx?ID=48), [_death ward_](/Spells.aspx?ID=64), or [_illusory scene_](/Spells.aspx?ID=161). You can Cast this Spell as a 5th-level divine innate spell once that day. You become an expert in divine spell DCs and divine spell attack rolls.
name: Kitsune Spell Expertise
